results.title: [The effect of simvastatin on the expression of high mobility group box-1 protein in atherosclerotic rats].

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ could obviously inhibit the formation of the @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaques@@@, and the effect was more obvious in the 12-week treatment group than that of the 10-week treatment group.
